name: Thinking Outside the Box (Piecraft)
description:
Design and make levels for your friends! 

It's kind of like a discount mario maker, but free! 

It's a simple platformer where you can create and load the levels from files, and send them to your friends. It's fun to create levels for your friends during calls and watch them play.

It's great fun for a while if you and your friends have gotten bored of all your games. Good entertainment for about 20 minutes.
